data.name: Acupuncture
data.subtitle: Balance and pain relief
data.shortDescription: Evidence-informed treatment to relieve pain and improve overall well-being.
data.shortDescription_zh: 循证治疗以缓解疼痛并改善整体健康。
data.longDescription: Acupuncture uses fine needles at specific points to encourage healing. Common concerns: back pain, headaches, stress, insomnia.
data.longDescription_zh: 针灸使用细针在特定穴位上促进愈合。常见问题：背痛、头痛、压力、失眠。

data.name: Massage Therapy
data.subtitle: Restore mobility and relax
data.shortDescription: Therapeutic and relaxation techniques tailored to your goals.
data.shortDescription_zh: 根据您的目标定制的治疗和放松技术。
data.longDescription: Techniques include deep tissue, sports, and prenatal massage. Benefits may include reduced muscle tension and better sleep.
data.longDescription_zh: 技术包括深层组织按摩、运动按摩和孕期按摩。益处包括减少肌肉紧张和改善睡眠。

data.name: Naturopathy
data.subtitle: Holistic health solutions
data.shortDescription: Natural therapies to support chronic conditions and wellness.
data.shortDescription_zh: 自然疗法支持慢性疾病和健康。
data.longDescription: Naturopathy combines nutrition, herbal remedies, and lifestyle changes to promote long-term health.
data.longDescription_zh: 自然疗法结合营养、草药疗法和生活方式改变，促进长期健康。
